text:
We could say something about CREEM and Univ StA, perhaps a few simple images












Photos: Steve Buckland






  
 
Finley Malloc is the Chief Data Scientist at Wengo Analytics. When not innovating on data platforms, Finley enjoys spending time unicycling and playing with her pet iguana.

title: Screen images of the various engines within Distance for Windows
text:
Examples of various engines performing their tasks within Distance for Windows. Click on any image to enlarge.









The multiple covariate distance sampling analysis engine.







The mark recapture distance sampling analysis engine.









The simulation engine.







The multi-analysis engine.

title: Citations for distance sampling software
text:
Distance for Windows preferred citation






Thomas, L., S.T. Buckland, E.A. Rexstad, J. L. Laake, S. Strindberg, S. L. Hedley, J. R.B. Bishop, T. A. Marques, and K. P. Burnham. 2010. Distance software: design and analysis of distance sampling surveys for estimating population size. Journal of Applied Ecology 47: 5-14. DOI: 10.1111/j.1365-2664.2009.01737.x











Distance R package preferred citation






Miller, D. L., Rexstad, E., Thomas, L., Marshall, L., & Laake, J. L. (2019). Distance Sampling in R. Journal of Statistical Software, 89(1), 1–28. DOI: 10.18637/jss.v089.i01
